original_text: But made his own people to go forth like sheep, and guided them in the wilderness like a flock.
korean_text: 그가 자기 백성은 양 같이 인도하여 내시고 광야에서 양 떼 같이 지도하셨도다

sentences.original_text: But made his own people to go forth
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그의 백성을 앞으로 나아가게 하셨으며

sentences.original_text: and guided them in the wilderness
